Verses: 1 karththaraagiya Naan Abishegampannina Koresukku Munbaaga Jaadhigalaik Keezhppaduththi, Raajaakkalin Idaikkattugalai Avizhkkumpadikkum, Avanukku Munbaaga Vaasalgal Poottappadaadhirukka, Kadhavugalaith Thirandhuvaikkumpadikkum, Avanaippaarththu, Avan Valadhukaiyaip Pidiththukkondu, Avanukku Sollugiradhaavadhu:
2 naan Unakku Munne Poi, Konalaanavaigalai Sevvaiyaakkuven.
3 unnaip Peyarsolli Azhaikkira Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naane Endru Nee Ariyumpadikku,

4 vengalak Kadhavugalai Udaiththu, Irupputh Thaazhppaalgalai Muriththu, Andhagaaraththil Irukkira Pokkishangalaiyum, Olippidaththil Irukkira Pudhaiyalgalaiyum Unakkuk Koduppen; Naan En Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobinimiththamum, Naan Therindhukonda Isravelinimiththamum, Naan Unnaip Peyarsolli Azhaiththu, Nee Ennai Ariyaadhirundhum Unakku Naamam Thariththen.
5 naane Karththar, Veroruvarillai; Ennaiththavira Dhevan Illai.

6 ennaiththavira Oruvarum Illaiyendru Sooriyan Udhikkira Thisaiyilum, Adhu Asthamikkira Thisaiyilum Ariyappadumpadikku Nee Ennai Ariyaadhirundhum, Naan Unakku Idaikkattu Kattinen; Naane Karththar, Veroruvar Illai.
7 oliyaip Padaiththu, Irulaiyum Undaakkinen, Samaadhaanaththaip Padaiththu Theengaiyum Undaakkugiravar Naane; Karththaraagiya Naane Ivaigalaiyellaam Seygiravar.

8 vaanangale Uyara Irundhu Soriyungal; Aagaayamandalangal Needhiyaippozhiyakkadavadhu; Boomi Thiravundu, Ratchippin Kaniyaiththandhu, Needhiyunkooda Vilaivadhaaga; Karththaraagiya Naan Ivaigalai Undaakkugiren.

9 mannodugalukkoththa Odaayirundhum, Thannai Uruvaakkinavarode Vazhakkaadugiravanukku Aiyo! Kaliman Thannai Uruvaakkinavanai Nokki: Enna Seygiraayendru Sollaththagumo? Un Kiriyaiyaanadhu: Avarukkuk Kaigalillaiyendru Sollalaamo?
10 thagappanai Nokki: En Janippiththaai Endrum, Thaayai Nokki: En Petraai Endrum Sollugiravanukku Aiyo!

11 isravelin Parisuththarum Avanai Uruvaakkinavarumaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu: Varunkaariyangalai Ennidaththil Kelungal; En Pillaigalaikkuriththum, En Karangalin Kiriyaigalaikkuriththum Enakkuk Kattalaiyidungal.
12 naan Boomiyai Undupanni, Naane Adhinmel Irukkira Manushargalai Sirushtiththen; En Karangal Vaanangalai Viriththana; Avaigalin Sarvasenaiyaiyum Naan Kattalaiyitten.

13 naan Needhiyinpadi Avanai Ezhuppinen; Avan Vazhigalaiyellaam Sevvaippaduththuven; Avan En Nagaraththaik Katti, Siraippattuppona Ennudaiyavargalaik Kirayamillaamalum Paridhaanamillaamalum Vidudhalaiyaakkuvaan Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

14 egipthin Sambaaththiyamum, Eththiyoppiyaavin Varththagalaabamum, Nediya Aatkalaagiya Sabeyarin Varththagalaabamum, Unnidaththirkuth Thaandivandhu, Unnudaiyadhaagum; Avargal Un Pinne Sendru, Vilangidappattu Nadandhuvandhu: Unnudanemaaththiram Dhevan Irukkiraar Endrum, Avaraiyallaamal Vere Dhevan Illaiyendrum Solli, Unnaippanindhukondu, Unnai Nokki Vinnappampannuvaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
15 isravelin Dhevanum Ratchagarumaagiya Neer Meyyaagave Ummai Maraiththukkondirukkira Dhevanaayirukkireer.
16 vikkiragangalai Undupannugira Anaivarum Vetkappattu Lachchaiyadaindhu Egamaaik Kalangippovaargal.
17 isravelo, Karththaraale Niththiya Ratchippinaal Ratchikkappaduvaan; Neengal Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Vetkappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Iruppeergal.

18 vaanangalai Sirushtiththu Boomiyaiyum Verumaiyaayirukka Sirushtiyaamal Adhaik Kudiyiruppukkaagachcheydhu Padaiththu, Adhai Uruverpaduththina Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhaavadhu: Naane Karththar, Veroruvar Illai.

19 naan Andharangaththilum, Boomiyin Andhagaaramaana Idaththilum Pesinadhillai; Virudhaavaaga Ennaith Thedungalendru Naan Yaakkobin Sandhadhikku Sonnadhumillai; Naan Needhiyaippesi, Yadhaarththamaanavaigalai Arivikkira Karththar.

20 jaadhigalinindru Thappinavargale, Koottankoodi Vaarungal; Egamaai Serungal; Thangal Vikkiragamaagiya Maraththai Sumandhu, Ratchikkamaattaadha Dhevanaith Thozhudhukollugiravargal Arivillaadhavargal.

21 neengal Therivikkumpadi Serndhu, Egamaai Yosanaipannungal; Idhaip Poorvakaalamudharkondu Vilangappanni, Annaalthuvakki Idhai Ariviththavar Yaar?karththaraagiya Naan Allavo? Needhibararum Ratchagarumaagiya Ennaiyallaamal Vere Dhevan Illai; Ennaiththavira Veroruvarum Illai.
22 boomiyin Ellaiyengumullavargale, Ennai Nokkippaarungal; Appozhudhu Ratchikkappaduveergal; Naane Dhevan, Veroruvarum Illai.

23 muzhangaal Yaavum Enakku Munbaaga Mudangum, Naavu Yaavum Ennai Munnittu Aanaiyidum Endru Naan Ennaikkonde Aanaiyittirukkiren; Indha Needhiyaana Vaarththai En Vaayilirundhu Purappattadhu; Idhu Maaruvadhu Illaiyengiraar.
24 karththaridaththilmaaththiram Needhiyum Vallamaiyumundendru Avanavan Solli Avaridaththil Vandhu Seruvaan; Avarukku Virodhamaai Erichchalkondirukkira Yaavarum Vetkappaduvaargal.
25 isravelin Sandhadhiyaagiya Yaavarum Karththarukkul Needhimaangalaakkappattu Menmaipaaraattuvaargal.
